history.proof: intros. unfold monotone, comp. intros H3 H4. qsimpl use: comp. qsimpl use: comp. qsimpl use: comp. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3. - sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros T3 T2 T1 f1 f2 H1 H2.
intros T3' T2 T1 f1 f2 H1 H2.
intros T3' T2' T1 f1 f2 H1 H2.
intros T3' T2' T1' f1 f2 H1 H2.
intros T3' T2' T1' f1' f2 H1 H2.
intros T3' T2' T1' f1' f2' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce f1 to an evaluable reference.
In environment T1, T2, T3 : poset f1 : T2 -> T1 f2 : T3 -> T2 H : monotone f1 H0 : monotone f2 H3, H4 : T3 Unable to unify "Poset.sort T3" with "Type".
In environment T1, T2, T3 : poset f1 : T2 -> T1 f2 : T3 -> T2 H : monotone f1 H0 : monotone f2 H3, H4 : T3 X : (?B0 -> ?A) -> (?C0 -> ?B0) -> ?C0 -> ?A Unable to unify "Poset.sort T3" with "Type".
The reference H5 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros T3 T2 T1 f1 f2 H1 H2. unfold monotone, comp. intros H3 H4. unfold comp, f1, f2 in *. intros x y H5. apply H3. apply H4. apply H5.
